title: @KateyKhaos - Dark Star Thresh .... Related to Star Guardian or Cosmic Reaver skin line?
body: Was just wondering if Dark Star Thresh was related to star guardian or cosmic reaver skin like in anyway.. Like maybe a villain type counter to star guardian, etc...

replies.body: Could be. She stated in her Ask.Fm page that they'd been looking for a good skin line name and ideas to start to be enemies to the Super Galaxy characters, and then this shows up. Though, the Super Galaxy line is very space anime based, and so far, this Dark Star Thresh seems more dark space god than space anime villain.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OWARj96q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-31T18:27:30.257+0000)
>
>... this Dark Star Thresh seems more dark space god than space anime villain.

Why not both? 

http://i.imgur.com/JUgY6FE.png?1 http://images4.fanpop.com/image/polls/686000/686050_1302456111705_full.jpg
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/4e/fb/0b/4efb0bd99f9ef3f4157510884034b511.jpg
Yea they just teased Dark Star Varus also.. He's amazing

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OWARj96q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-01T21:14:27.328+0000)
>
> Nope, not related! :o

Just a question, is this skin related to the Void?
Nope, not in this case. The thematic was inspired by cosmic horror, eldritch monsters and sci-fi references.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OWARj96q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-01T21:14:27.328+0000)
>
> Nope, not related! :o

Really?

Cosmic Reaver and Dark Star seem like 2 skin themes of opposite aspects.

Cosmic Reaver seeks for balance, Dark Star seeks for oblivion/chaos.  And both of them are related with space. I can't believe they're not related.
Darn. Sounds like a perfect "villain" group name for Star Guardians to face off with.

I assumed they were related to Aurelion Sol.

And if the next Ultimate skin is Dark Star Aurelion Sol, I called it. :P
Oh c'mon I'm already preparing my wallet for Varus xD
